org.bbi.linuxjoy

Class SocketBridge

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.bbi.linuxjoy.SocketBridge

  • public class SocketBridge
extends java.lang.Object
    Opens a socket interface for the Linux joystick device.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static int POLL_INTERVAL_MS
      Polling interval in milliseconds.
      boolean STOP
      Stop listening to connections

      Stop sending data

      Connect to a SocketJoystick server and send joystick data

    • Field Detail

      • POLL_INTERVAL_MS

        public static int POLL_INTERVAL_MS
        Polling interval in milliseconds. Note that polling is a blocking operation, so this interval will only come into play between events and not when the underlying joystick object is idle

      • STOP

        public boolean STOP
        Stop listening to connections

      • STOP_SEND

        public boolean STOP_SEND
        Stop sending data

    • Method Detail

      • serve

        public void serve(LinuxJoystick jj,
         int port)
        Serve the provided joystick object to the specified socket port
        Parameters:
        jj - Reference to the joystick object
        port - Port number to listen to

      • connect

        public void connect(LinuxJoystick jj,
           java.lang.String address,
           int port)
        Connect to a SocketJoystick server and send joystick data
        Parameters:
        jj - Reference to the joystick object
        address - Address of the server
        port - Port of the server

      • stop

        public void stop()
        Stop connection
